item.title: Extremal Graph Theroy
item.description: Mantel's Theorem: Suppose G(V,E) is a graph on n vertices without triangles, then $|E|\leq \frac{n^2}{4}$ Turan's Theorem: Let $G(V,E)$ be a graph with $|V| = n$. If G has no r-clique, $r \geqslant 2$, then $|E| \leqslant \dfrac{r-2}{2(r-1)} n^2$

item.title: Extremal Set Theroy
item.description: Extremal Set Theroy Sunflowers Definition (sunflower): A set family $ {\mathcal {F}}\subseteq 2^{X}$ is a sunflower of size $ r$ with a core $ C\subseteq X$ if $ \forall S,T\in {\mathcal {F}}$ that $ S\neq T$, $ S\cap T=C$. Sunflower Lemma (Erdős-Rado) Let $ {\mathcal {F}}\subseteq {X \choose k}$. If $ |{\mathcal {F}}|>k!(r-1)^{k}$, then $ {\mathcal {F}}$ contains a sunflower of size $ r$. Erdős–Ko–Rado theorem Erdős–Ko–Rado theorem (proved in 1938, published in 1961): Let $ {\mathcal {F}}\subseteq {X \choose k}$ where $ |X|=n$ and $ n\geq 2k$.

item.title: Ramsey Theroy
item.description: Ramsey theory Ramsey's theorem ramsey's theorem for graph Let $ k,\ell $ be positive integers. Then there exists an integer $ R(k,\ell )$ satisfying: If $ n\geq R(k,\ell )$, for any coloring of edges of $ K_{n}$ with two colors red and blue, there exists a red $ K_{k}$ or a blue $ K_{\ell }$ . Ramsey's Theorem (graph, multicolor) Let $ r,k_{1},k_{2},\ldots ,k_{r}$ be positive integers. Then there exists an integer $ R(r;k_{1},k_{2},\ldots ,k_{r})$ satisfying: For any $ r$ -coloring of a complete graph of $ n\geq R(r;k_{1},k_{2},\ldots ,k_{r})$ vertices, there exists a monochromatic $ k_{i}$-clique with the $ i$ th color for some $ i\in {1,2,\ldots ,r}$.

item.title: Matching Theroy
item.description: Matching theroy Systems of Distinct Representatives (SDR) A system of distinct representatives (SDR) (also called a transversal) for a sequence of (not necessarily distinct) sets $ S_{1},S_{2},\ldots ,S_{m}$ is a sequence of distinct elements $ x_{1},x_{2},\ldots ,x_{m}$ such that $ x_{i}\in S_{i}$ for all $i=1,2,\ldots ,m$. 就是指每个集合中找到一个代表的元素，这些元素各不
